com.example.messagesiphon

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.messagesiphon.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Message>

    public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Message>
    This class holds the information of one message in a Facebook conversation; its author, the timestamp, its id, and the message.
    Author:
    Tom
